summary: Removes glow sounds when you draw or seathe your enchanted weapon.
descriptionHtml:
Removes Enchanted draw/seathe sounds from all weapons.

NOTE: Normal weapon sounds can still be heard. This mod only removes the enchant sound effect.


Install:
Extract to Data folder.

Uninstall:
Remove all files from \"Data\\sound\\fx\\mag\\enchantedunsheathe\"


===================
Author: suomipoi
v.1.0
02-07-2013
DD-MM-YYYY

Keywords: Draw weapon sound, Seathe weapon sound, Glow sound, Weapon glow, Glow sound removal, No more weapon glow sound, Barbecue sound removal
author: suomipoi
